definition: to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: For instance, Christmas gifts and toys, they are exported around the world.
sentences.chinese: 例如，圣诞礼品和玩具，它们是出口世界各地。

sentences.english: Have you ever bought toys at a fast food restaurant?
sentences.chinese: 你曾经在一个快餐店里买过玩具吗？

sentences.english: I got the picnic toy sets.
There has been a stable demas well like in our market for this kind of toy.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的市场上，这种玩具的需求平素很稳定。

sentences.english: Many techie toys are wallet-friendly at under $30.
sentences.chinese: 许多技术人员的玩具钱包友好在30美元以下。

sentences.english: Of product structure, in order, represented by lower-middle class plush toys.
sentences.chinese: 就产品结构而言，以长毛绒为代表的中低档玩具为主。

sentences.english: Take apart the pieces before putting the toys away.
sentences.chinese: 玩具拿开前先将它拆成一件件滴。

sentences.english: What do you see in a toy shop ?
sentences.chinese: 在玩具商店里你能看见什么？

sentences.english: It must be a toy car that(which) can be assembled.
sentences.chinese: 一定是个能组装的玩具车。

sentences.english: I adumbrate that I did not like his toys .
sentences.chinese: 我在暗示我不喜欢他的玩具。

sentences.english: It was on show at the International Tokyo Toy Show.
sentences.chinese: 它曾在东京国际玩具展中展出。

sentences.english: Tech toys would come as standard with the computer.
sentences.chinese: 工学院的玩具会标配有电脑。

sentences.english: Safe boxes, fancy clock, mini fans, timers.
sentences.chinese: 保险盒，玩具钟，微型风扇，记时器。

sentences.english: They don t need candies or toys.
sentences.chinese: 他们并不需要糖果或玩具。

sentences.english: Haba toys are a great choice that will stand the test of time.
sentences.chinese: 哈巴玩具是一个不错的选择，经得起时间的考验。

sentences.english: The amphibious whale shaped toy is provided for solving that the amphibious toy is less.
sentences.chinese: 为解决当前水陆两用玩具较少而提供的。

definition: toy figurine/action figure/stuffed animal/doll/(fig.) sb's plaything
